title: Black Monday Roundup: Ron Rivera to Redskins? Is Jason Garrett fired yet? (Football 12/31)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to react to everything that happened and didn't happen on Black Monday across the NFL. The guys discuss the Redskins closing in on hiring Ron Rivera (10:00), the Cowboys indecision regarding Jason Garrett (22:30), as well as continued uncertainty on Doug Marrone's future with the Jaguars (34:30). The Pick Six Superfriends analyze potential candidates for the Giants (42:15) and Browns (48:30) after the firings of Pat Shurmur and Freddie Kitchens, before updating the Panthers coaching search.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
